item.title: Tree has been ineffectively maintained, 18th July
item.description:
The elm tree outside 108/110 Murray Avenue Bromley BR1 3DL has been ineffectively maintained and allowed to grow too high, superseding the height of both houses by some margin. It has rooted across gardens and the roots are now growing supplemental shoots/small trees inside property boundaries which puts the structure of the houses at risk. The tree requires pruning or preferably removing before it is allowed to cause considerable damage to the foundations of the buildings. This is very alarming and constitutes a major issue for those involved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollards not working, 18th July
item.description:
City inspectors reported no electricity coverage or lighting present on 12 bollards at 8a Fernhead Road yesterday late afternoon. Maida hill market. I have informed uberlecricity (shell) and a representative from Conways. Please could this atter be investigated as a matter of urgency due to their being an event this Sunday at the location in question.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Godson Yard, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping again in Melvin Road, 18th July
item.description:
A bag of rubbish dumped by a tree outside 20 Melvin Road and an item put by the lamppost outside the same address. I am not aloud to name anyone but the item by the lamppost had been laying in a front garden for weeks. My report 7873464 about other fly tipping was dealt with on Tuesday 15th July and here we are again more rubbish dumped near the same area .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartfield Grove, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The butchers Meat Plaza grill meat in bulk leading to a horrid smell in the residential neighborhood, 18th July
item.description:
The butchers Meat Plaza next door to us Grove House, Stamford Grove West N16 6LL burn/grill meat in bulk on Fridays leading to a horrible smell in my house. This is making breathing difficult at home now when I leave the windows open due to the heat.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged street paving/incorrect reinstatement by utilities company, 18th July
item.description:
Recent works outside Axe and Bottle Court, 70 Newcomen St, London SE1 1YT which has been under renovations - has caused removal of the carefully laid granite road paving and replaced with asphalt damaging the quality road paving that has been in place for over a decade. The utilities works provider needs to be held to account to put back as it was. Previous works by contractors such as Thames Water have done so - why not this one? This is related to ongoing approved planning works to this site and needs to be reinstated as original ASAP

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Newcomen Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
